column1: Assigned to review project app emails code mess up
column2:
The automatic "assigned to review the project application" emails that are sent out after Admin assigns reviewers to project applications has a malfunction in the code for the first line.

The first line should read: You have been selected to review ''project application name'' by == Organization Name == to be considered for funding through Blue Planet Run's Peer Water Exchange.

Instead, it reads: You have been selected to review ''the project application'' by ''project application name'' to be considered for funding through Blue Planet Run's Peer Water Exchange.

The link is fine, it is just the text that has been messed up. I tested all the links and they work.

Here is an example: 
Dear Ned Breslin,

You have been selected to review the project application by test tuesday to be considered for funding through Blue Planet Run's Peer Water Exchange.

Kindly review the project details as soon as possible to give you and the team the most time to ask for clarifications and make suggestions.

You can use the Question & Answer forum to post any questions and comments on the application. These are visible to all the reviewers and the applicant; any of whom can respond to further comment on or clarify your observations. You will get an email notification when any comment or response is posted. If you have input regarding comments by your peers, please share it in the same forum.

Please note that the deadline to submit your final rating and comments is 17 June, 2008. Please submit your rating in time - click on the "Ratings & Comments" tab when you are ready.

You will find all the reviews assigned to you in the 'To Do' section of your PWX dashboard when you login to PWX.

Thank you in advance for your participation. Your expertise is what makes PWX work: eliminate bureaucracy, increase transparency, enable cooperation and knowledge-sharing, strengthen the world's first participatory decision-making system, and help scale up our work to reach millions who lack safe drinking water and sanitation.

Thank you,
The Peer Water Exchange Team


------- Please do not reply to this automatically generated email -------
